answers.answer: At times we get pitchmen from Diab-X posting on this forum acting like innocent people seeking information on this snakeoil. All they're trying to do is get your curiosity aroused so you'll buy into their pitch and then buy their snakeoil. Don't believe it. Read between the lines of their hype. Proven results for each individual herb/supplement but not when combined. Diab-X has been discussed on this forum and proven to be snakeoil. Follow the link below and start at the bottom to follow the posts.http://www.medhelp.org/posts/Diabetes---Adult-Type-II/DIAB-X/show/524836

question: How does this Diab-X work? Does it work with type 2 diabetes? What is good about diab-x? What is bad about it?
title: Diabetes and Diab-X
